articles.title: Mexico kidnapping: Why a million Americans a year risk Mexico medical tourism - BBC
articles.description: Some take precautions to avoid being targeted by criminals, like changing their car's licence plate.
articles.content:
Americans often travel to Mexico for low-cost medical services. But bargain shopping for healthcare can be risky. 
Over the weekend, four Americans were kidnapped in Matamoros, Tamaulipas, after tra… [+3792 chars]
